text: Evgeny Plakhutin (born 19 August 1994) is a Russian karateka. He won a bronze medal at the 2019 European Games and was the European champion in 2019.WKF Ranking. World Karate Federation.PLAKHUTIN EVGENY. European Games official website.Karatekas delighted to be part of Karate 1- Premier League experience.
